name: Puff Puff
description:
Our entry for the Game Dev League July Game Jam 2021. The theme is "size does really matter". So we made a game with a puffer fish that can puffer up and shrink again. And thanks to our artist Biralo it's also pretty cute. :)


We are Team Tote Taube (German for "Team Dead Pigeon") and are
T3V as programmer

Bakasilisk as programmer

Biralo as Artist

As engine was used T3Vtech. (https://github.com/tevoran/T3Vtech )
